page.title: 06TOURISM
page.content:
In our block, the North Shropshire Union Canal runs through on its way to Llangollen.
These are the local canal boat hire companies and their current hire prices: Bridge Canal Cruisers- 11 boats for hire- Â£176 to Â£495 Holidays Afloat- 4 boats, 2x6 berths, 1x4 berth and 1x3 berth- Â£111 to Â£186 Black Prince- 133 boats- Â£126 to Â£296 Five Star Fleet- 450 boats hired out over a 23-24 week period- Â£138 to Â£465
Lots of boats travel on the canal in summer especially(though some of the boats have central heating now) and the holiday makers seem to enjoy themselves alot.
